item.description:
Title
Annual Winter Open House Event today!
When
Sunday, November 16, 2008 12:00 PM
Details :
Annual Winter Open House
" Always in Season!"

Sunday, November 16
10am – 5pm
Cost: FREE admission all day!

Gardens, Trails, Orangerie, Twig's Cafe, Gift Shop, Library & more... Admission is usually charged but today is FREE! I have been a member for several years. This is a truly beautiful oasis. Especially during the winter months!
For info: www.towerhillbg.org

• Newest holiday merchandise for sale in the Gift Shop!

• Milton Gallery information booths about membership, private rentals, educational programs, youth programs, volunteering, horticulture, and the future development.

• Enjoy free food samplings, exciting drawings with prizes from local area merchants and restaurants

*Enjoy "Piano Sundays" at Twigs Cafe. Pianist Dennis Deyo masterly performs renditions of pop standards, Broadway and classical piano

• Guided tour of the Garden at 2pm.

• This is an indoor and outdoor event. Dress warm and comfortably!

*****NOTE: I have invited other meetup groups to this event
MORE INFO TO FOLLOW..........................
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup directly inside The Stoddard Edu and Visitor Center
item.name: Annual Winter Open House Today !
